Header: Police detect 50,000 liters of illegal diesel
Content: Police have raided a large scale illegal diesel storage complex at a house in Dickwella, Nil-wella area. Police have seized more than 50,000 liters of illegal diesel from the storage complex. Police have also seized a bowser and six lorries used for the racket. They have arrested the owner of the house. Dickwella Police are conducting further investigations into the incident. The raid has been conducted by the officers of Tangalla, Matara, Police range.
